title: [Icebriar Lake, Lodge]
description: Dark briar hedges loom behind a riverstone lodge, dozens of tiny, candelit gourds impaled on their thorns casting eerie shadows across the grounds.  In front of the lodge, a frozen lake sparkles in the starlight, and large drifts of snow block access to everything except the lodge entrances and the pathway.

Dark briar hedges loom behind a riverstone lodge, dozens of tiny, bright orange gourds impaled on their thorns.  In front of the lodge, a frozen lake glitters in the daylight, and large drifts of snow block access to everything except the lodge entrances and the pathway.
